mdRecord.dcterms:title: Announcing the Opening of the Farmers' Supply 1910
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A photocopy of a newspaper clipping from The Floyd Press dated May 26, 1910 that announced the opening of the Farmers' Supply Store on June 1st, 1910. G.W. Ratliff, Manager
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Farm equipment
Retail stores
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
